description: Orchestrator Agent hooks - task completion enforcement, verification, polling
_note: Hook data is passed via stdin as JSON. Scripts read from stdin, not env vars.

Stop._description: Blocks premature exit until all tasks are complete

PreToolUse._description: MANDATORY: Blocks agent work reports if instruction verification incomplete

UserPromptSubmit._description: MANDATORY: Reminds orchestrator when progress polling is overdue

PostToolUse._description: Track file modifications for orchestration context
